title: Bug 114470[Smoke]Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
description: An error message is thrown when attempting to use the value new Date('3/2/2005') in a table filter.
OB: When attempting to filter a table based on a datetime column using the value new Date('3/2/2005'), an error message is displayed.
EB: When using the value new Date('3/2/2005') in a table filter, there should be no error message displayed and the table should be filtered based on the specified datetime value.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new datasource and a dataset that contains a datetime column. 
2. Insert a table into the report and add a filter based on the datetime column. 
3. In the filter's value1 field, input new Date('3/2/2005') and apply the filter.
